name: Kevin Smith
description: I am Single My name is Kevin Smith, I am Engineer Contract , i Love my work – enjoy every minute of it. Strong, independent, but not domineering. Have strong family values and nurture my relationship with my family and friends. I believe in honesty – no matter how cruel – I would rather deal with the reality than living in a fool’s paradise. I am not easily intimidated, but I am not attracted to load and overbearing people. The strong silent type would attract me more. It would be like watching one of the Art films where few words are spoken but so much is said! I like the occasional good visits with friends but enjoy being just at home watching a good movie and having a glass of wine.
